SELECT
IF(AVG(view_num) IS NULL,0,view_num) AS view_num
IF(AVG(collection_num) IS NULL,0,collection_num) AS collection_num
FROM bq_category_counter WHERE category_id = #{categoryId}

SELECT A.id_ FROM bq_category A LEFT JOIN bq_user B ON A.user_id = B.id_ AND B.id_ = A.user_id WHERE A.enable_ = 1 AND ( B.name_ LIKE CONCAT('%', #{cm.keyword}, '%') OR A.name_ LIKE CONCAT('%', #{cm.keyword}, '%') ) GROUP BY A.user_id ORDER BY A.is_hot DESC,A.create_time DESC

SELECT COUNT(1) AS TOTAL FROM ( SELECT A.id_ FROM bq_category A LEFT JOIN bq_user B ON A.user_id = B.id_ AND B.id_ = A.user_id WHERE A.enable_ = 1 AND ( B.name_ LIKE CONCAT('%', #{cm.keyword}, '%') OR A.name_ LIKE CONCAT('%', #{cm.keyword}, '%') ) GROUP BY A.user_id ) A
